recipesJson.name: Chocolate Sugar Lips
recipesJson.author: heatbbx
recipesJson.description:
#FatKidHype

Look no further. Here I bring you a Chocolate Cookie Pudding. This is more of a chocolate pudding with crumbles of cookie layered around and a nice dollop of vanilla spread layered on top.


- JF Milk Chocolate + FLV Vanilla Pudding + CAP Vanilla Custard make the strong pudding base.

- CAP Sugar Cookie + JF Biscuit layer in a cookie bakery appeal. You could probably sub in INW Biscuit at the same % for a similar effect.

- TPA Vanilla Swirl + FA Meringue really put that vanilla silkiness into the flavor.

I would recommend at least 3 days to let the flavors get to know each other. 7 is prime time.

Vape it, Love it :) Comment with any feedback below!
